main event: An observation of a dark speck or object moving across the face of the moon on August 11, 1955.
interesting points: The observation was made by a person at a drive-in movie while watching the moon,The object was seen to orbit the moon three times every two minutes,The witness expected the object to be large due to its visibility as a dark speck on the moon,The observation lasted for about 10 minutes initially, and the object was seen again after a half hour,The sighting was reported in detail to the Air Force and the witness stressed they do not seek publicity.
sighted object: a dark speck or object moving across the moon's surface
witness description: The witness is a 55-year-old man with two years of college education, who runs a furniture business and is cautious about making reports that could affect his reputation.
